'Purpose: fires custom method stored in scheduling_method or update_method property ' of input project item. 'Input parameters format: ' <Item type="Method" action="PM_fireCustomProjectHook"> ' <body project_id="PROJECT_ID" prop_name="scheduling_method|update_method"/> ' </Item>
Dim tmpInn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() Dim bodyNd As XmlElement = CType(Me.node.selectSingleNode("body"), XmlElement) If bodyNd Is Nothing Then Return tmpInn.newError("Body is not specified.") Dim projId As String = bodyNd.getAttribute("project_id") Dim prop_name As String = bodyNd.getAttribute("prop_name")
Dim rs As Aras.Server.Core.InnovatorDataSet Dim conn As Aras.Server.Core.InnovatorDatabase = CCO.Variables.InnDatabase projId = If(string.IsNullOrEmpty(projId), projId, projId.Replace("'", "''")) Dim sql As String = _ " SELECT name FROM [Method] " & _ " WHERE [Method].config_id IN (SELECT config_id FROM [Method] WHERE id = (SELECT " & CCO.DB.InnDatabase.QuoteName(prop_name) & " FROM [PROJECT] WHERE id='" & projId & "')) AND [Method].is_current='1'" rs = conn.ExecuteSelect(sql)
If Not rs.Eof() Then Dim methodName As String = CStr(rs.Value(0, "")) Dim body As String = "" Select Case prop_name Case "scheduling_method" body = String.Format("<body project_id='{0}'/>", System.Security.SecurityElement.Escape(projId)) Case "update_method" body = String.Format("<project_item><Item type='Project' id='{0}'/></project_item>", System.Security.SecurityElement.Escape(projId)) Case Else Return tmpInn.newError("prop_name attribute value does not supported.") End Select Return tmpInn.applyMethod(methodName, body) Else Return tmpInn.newError("Project was not found in database.") End If
